message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair deal. I'm offering it to you for $90.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I appreciate the fair deal you're trying to make, but I'm not sure $90 is quite right for me.  Would you be willing to come down to $85?  I'm really interested in this product, and I think this price would be fair for both of us.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $87.50. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth it.
